input: Execute a batch request that combines retrieving all details of prolongation requests, including agreements and business process assignments.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /LoanContractProlongationRequests?$select=*&$expand=BusinessProcessChainAssignment,TermAgreements,IncomingPaymentAgreements HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator--
